plugin.title: Player5Plugin
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: This plugin demonstrates the Player 5 ActionScript API. It positions itself on or around the player, reads in configuration data, and controls the player

flashvar.name: position
flashvar.description: Position of the plugin. Can be "over", "left", "right", "top" or "bottom".

flashvar.name: size
flashvar.description: Width or height of the plugin when not over the display.
